title: The Nature of life: respiration in animals
brief_description: Explores the similarities of air-breathing and water-breathing animals, developing this concept through the animal kingdom to man himself. Demonstrations show the vital relationships between the animal’s size and the complexity of its respiratory system - between respiration, blood circulation and feeding.
